Name: AuthBlock
Description: CEF SSO Authentication block to recognize your DNN login status

PasswordHash.Name: PasswordHash
PasswordHash.Description: Enter a string value to be used to hash the password, this must match the settings in CEF for decryption

SaltKey.Name: SaltKey
SaltKey.Description: Enter a string value to use as a salt for the encryption, this must match the settings in CEF for decryption.

VIKey.Name: VIKey
VIKey.Description: Enter a string value to use as a salt for the encryption, this must match the settings in CEF for decryption.
